description: Beyond its shimmering colours, the Anima Birdie is a ski dedicated to big mountain skiing that combines confidence and maneuverability. It is very playful, performs well on hard snow for its size, and is very stable at high speeds. The anima follows the creativity of the skier and always stays under her foot. Let it go!
name: Anima Birdie Skis 2023/24 - Womens

specs.value: classic camber underfoot with short ski
long curve radius, high speed stability, good grip
easy to get off the ground

specs.key: Very progressive flex in the tip and tail, but firmer at the ski/snow contact points
specs.value: good deformation in soft snow and efficient on hard snow
